meanings.definition: To cover or obscure with a screen or screens.
meanings.sent1: She bescreens her phone to prevent scratches.
meanings.sent2: The curtains bescreens the room from the harsh sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat bescreens itself behind the potted plant.
meanings.sent4: The fog bescreens the view of the distant mountains.
meanings.sent5: The magician bescreens his tricks from the audience's view.

meanings.definition: To protect or shield with a screen or screens.
meanings.sent1: He bescreens his computer to keep it safe from dust.
meanings.sent2: The bodyguard bescreens the VIP from unwanted attention.
meanings.sent3: The superhero bescreens the city from evil villains.
meanings.sent4: The umbrella bescreens her from the pouring rain.
meanings.sent5: The fortress bescreens the treasure from intruders.
